Package index

All functions

fcn_add_date_interval()
Add date interval id to all of the dates
fcn_adj_matrix()
Generate adjacency matrix for spatial autocorrelation using a secondary grid, and lookup table from primary grid to secondary grid

Extract perpendicular distances for all databases

Check if fractions in extracted covariates sum up to approximately 1

Helper functions

Check if all sightings in the line transect is represented in the perpendicular transects table

Convert date difference matrix to sparse matrix of weights of the two closest dates for temporal interpolation

Get number of days difference between the two dates
fcn_date_diff_matrix()
